mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.user_id AS "userId", a.type AS "type", a.refer_id AS "referId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO msg_notice_like ( id, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, del_flag, remarks, user_id, type, refer_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{userId}, #{type}, #{referId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE msg_notice_like SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateTime}, del_flag = #{delFlag}, remarks = #{remarks}, user_id = #{userId}, type = #{type}, refer_id = #{referId} WHERE id = #{id}
